mainPage.subGreeting: A 15-year-old programmer from Germany creating games, web apps, and tools to learn new things and share ideas.

discord.head: My Discord Community
discord.text: Welcome to the official Orosemo Discord, my community hub. Here you can connect with others, get early access to updates, and exchange knowledge with other like minded. Youâ€™ll also find community channels for chatting, collaborating, and showcasing your own creations. Everyone is warmly invited to join the server and engage with the community!

gamesPage.headline: My Games
gamesPage.subHeadline: All games i've made so far.

Jolly Jumper.description: A christmas themed jump'n'run with the goal to retrive the presents stolen by the grinch. Each level is a unvorgiving and difficult challendge.

Easter Eggscape.description: A Easter themed rage platformer in which the player plays a egg trying to get back into the right nest after being missplaced in a birds nest.

toolsPage.headline: My Tools
toolsPage.subHeadline: All tools i've made so far.

QR-Code Generator.description: Create QR-Codes online for free and customize them as you like.

Jam Management Discord Bot.description: Manage Jams (competitions) in your discord servers very easily..
